byline.original: By ROBERT CYRAN and NEIL UNMACK

lead_paragraph: Huge hostile deals are usually catnip for arbitrageurs, but the latest battles come with cross-border complexity, antitrust concerns and a poison pill, Robert Cyran and Neil Unmack of Reuters Breakingviews write.

headline.main: Fear Keeps Traders on Sidelines of Drug Mega-Deals

snippet: Huge hostile deals are usually catnip for arbitrageurs, but the latest battles come with cross-border complexity, antitrust concerns and a poison pill, Robert Cyran and Neil Unmack of Reuters Breakingviews write.
